trans-unit.source: An <see langword="abstract" /> base class representing a comparison that can be used to constrain an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> or a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="abstract" /> classe base que representa uma comparação que pode ser usada para restringir uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is the abstract base class from which <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> is derived.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> é a classe base abstrata da qual <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> é derivado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> is evaluated by comparing the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> é avaliado, comparando o valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the name of the member whose value will be compared.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o nome do membro cujo valor será comparado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to be compared.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> will be compared to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> serão comparados com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> aplicando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the operator to use in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o operador a ser usado na comparação.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the value to compare.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém ou define o valor a ser comparado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> will be compared to the value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Value%2A> será comparado com o valor de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Member%2A> aplicando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
